The original claim stated that: State Forces Citizens to Pay for ‘Stargazing Permit’ to View Night Sky in Public Parks." This claim was found to be mostly false by the expert.
The Free Thought Project: the source of the claim, changed its post after the fact-check was published to reflect the expert's findings and apologized for any confusion caused.

The expert reached out to The Free Thoug: and they clarified that the permit mentioned in their post was specifically for after-hours access to certain state parks for stargazing, not for simply looking up at the stars.
